title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Finance) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister finance) order 2021

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Fiona O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Fiona O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, Government Buildings, Upper Merrion 
Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Finance 
with effect from 23 August 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

8 September, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [462] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN, 
BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 8, 
D08 XAO6 

Teil: 046 942 3100 
r-phost: publications@opw.ie

D08 XAO6
